name: Comet Connects
aboutpara1: Hi there! Welcome to the passion project of 2 brown girls in business :)
aboutpara2: Throughout our careers, we often felt underestimated by our peers. Whether or not they recognized that they held internal bias, we were always aware. Additionally, EDI programs were always difficult to find and not very accessible.
aboutpara3: Thus, we created Comet, a fun and easy website to support and empower the next generation of business leaders!
aboutpara4: On this website, you can find EDI programs and initiatives, resources, stories from your fellow POC, and some additional tips and tricks from recruiters, and what we learned along the way
dogpara: Fun fact: we named this website after one of our dogs :)

resume.description: A list of EDI programs, initiatives, and scholarships weâ€™ve compiled

what.one: EDI stands for â€œEquity, Diversity, and Inclusion
what.two: These programs were created by companies to provide equitable access, reduce discrimination, and ensure diversity within their company.
what.three: They are a great opportunity to connect with other POC and are a great way to get involved in the company and learn more!
